backend/main.mo: Defines authorization, user approval, role types, content models, data stores, and locking logic for notices, homework, routines, and class times.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the footer credit-label feature and listing modified files and components involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, detailing their role in routing, auth, UI, locks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH theme variables and base styles for light/dark modes and layout foundation.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, auth guards, redirects, and wraps pages with AppLayout when authenticated.
frontend/src/auth/AuthContext.tsx: Provides global auth state, login/logout helpers, role flags, and session persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Utilities for saving, loading, and clearing session data in localStorage with typed roles.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with navigation, mobile drawer, user greeting, logout, and footer containing the shiny credit label.
frontend/src/components/LockIndicator.ts: Tooltip-based lock/unlock icon component showing admin lock status for sections or items.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: A React error boundary that captures runtime errors, logs them, and displays a fallback component with a reset option.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: UI fallback shown on runtime errors, with reload/reset capability and optional error details in development.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocks.ts: React Query hooks for reading and updating master, section, and item content locks through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on applications, announcements, homework, routines, and class times via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode styles, animations, and global base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page showing applications, announcements, and lock controls with actions for approval, role changes, and lock toggling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Renders an admin login form that validates a hardcoded password and logs in the user if correct. Handles password visibility toggle and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ClassRoutinePage.tsx: Displays the latest class routine grouped by days, showing periods, times, subjects, and teachers. Handles loading states and section lock status.
frontend/src/pages/ClassTimeSchedulePage: Manages class time entries with add, edit, and delete dialogs, supporting per-item and section-level locking. Groups class times by weekday and sorts them by start time.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a welcome header, quick-access sections, recent announcements, and admin-only controls. Also displays routine highlights and section lock indicators.
frontend/src/pages/HomeworkPage.tsx: Lists homework items with add, edit, and delete dialogs, respecting section and item lock states. Sorts homework by timestamp and renders editable cards.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: Provides a notice board with CRUD actions for announcements and lock-aware UI. Sorts notices by timestamp and supports editing via dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: Displays a pending approval message for users awaiting admin approval and provides a logout button redirecting to home.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Shows a role selection interface for students, visitors, and admins, each leading to its respective route.
frontend/src/pages/StudentApplyPage.tsx: Provides a student application form, submits data via mutation, and shows a confirmation screen once submitted.
frontend/src/pages/StudentLoginPage.tsx: Implements a simple student login form that authenticates locally and navigates to the home page on success.
frontend/src/pages/VisitorLoginPage.tsx: Offers a password-protected visitor login with toggled visibility and redirects to home on correct entry.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including versioning, architectural notes, known issues, and a detailed list of implemented features for a role‑based school website system. Captures requirements around authentication, admin workflows, locking, SPA behavior, and deployment considerations.
